actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: To amend section 18 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to improve the program providing for demolition and disposition of public housing.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Public Housing Disposition Reform Act - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise provisions regarding the demolition and disposition of public housing, including: (1) conditions for waiver of the "one-for-one" replacement rule; and (2) tenant consultation and relocation assistance.

titles.title: To amend section 18 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to improve the program providing for demolition and disposition of public housing.
